column4: big problem: deleted (moved to trash) many files from mounted disks and got error: disk full.
now / is full (0 bytes free) and i dont have a trashcan-icon on my desktop. how to empty it??
the trash-icon is typically in the task bar, on the right at the bottom of the screen.
if you right-click on the taskbar or menubar and select "Add to Panel...", you can choose "Deleted Items", and it will place the trash icon on your taskbar.
